article: I was at a coffee shop last night taking in a wonderful folk music performance, and was busy tapping my feet,and _ along to the relaxing tunes! WhenI got up to get a cup of coffee and a _ ,I noticed a middle-aged woman nearby.She had _ been caught in a fire of some sort. Her face had been seriously _ ,so that the skin looked very tight.She almost had no nose.and her eyes were tiny.I took a deep breath,and went back to my _ ,thinking how brave she was to come out and _ public.I also felt _ of myself for shuddering and looking down while I _ back to my seat,unable to send even a weak _ her way As I was sipping my coffee and eating my cookie,I kept thinking about _ I should ignore this moment and just _ my own business,or do something about my feelings.I couldn't let it go.I went for a refill of coffee and to get another cookie, _ this time I made my way slowly _ the wonan,said,"Isn't he a wonderful performer?"and gave her a largest smile I was able to give.To my _ ,she looked right at me and gave me a huge SMILE in return! I'm sure it took this woman a _ time to find her smile after her terrible _ .I believe that my smile _ her day,and hers also made me very happy.She seemed to have _ to find peace with herself,and I was _ ,because her smile had made her beautiful Sometimes it takes _ to smile,considering how hard life can be.
